text: KKAN (1490 AM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of Phillipsburg, Kansas. The station is owned by Robert D. Yates, Jr., through licensee RTY Broadcasting, and airs a variety/full-service format. The station was assigned the KKAN call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on June 23, 1960. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * FCC Public Inspection File for KKAN * FCC History Card for KKAN * KAN Category:Radio stations established in 1960 Category:1960 establishments in Kansas Category:Variety radio stations in the United States Category:Phillips County, Kansas
title: KKAN (AM)
